PrimeText:
During the blocks in which you're presented with one of the names you typed,



Press SPACE to continue.
ImagineText: please make your decisions while imagining that person is in the room with you.

PrimeText:
During the blocks in which you're presented with the word "High",



Press SPACE to continue.
ImagineText: please make your decisions while considering that these trials have a high probability of being selected.

PrimeText:
During the blocks in which you're presented with the word "Low",



Press SPACE to continue.
ImagineText: please make your decisions while considering that these trials have a low probability of being selected.

PrimeText:
During the blocks in which you see the word 'Choice',



Press SPACE to continue.
ImagineText: please make your decisions as you normally would, without any additional considerations.
